name: Can't stay forever - Metroidvania
description:
Pitch:

Can't stay forever is a simple looking but stylish Metroidvania game, all about exploration, getting new equipment and solving physics puzzles.

Gameplay:

The game features puzzles throughout, these are based always based on the players current abilities, or are meant to show the lack of an ability. As the player you must explore these caves to solve the puzzles and unlock equipment to solve the next puzzle.

Controls:

The game is controled via standard keyboard game contorls:

  • 'A' to go left, 
  • 'D' to go right, 
  • 'Space bar' to jump. 
  • Eventually the mouse will be involved (no spoilers) this mechanic is a simple 'left click' action.
